Reference

All functions

TB_decrease_as_matrix()

Annual Decreae in TB from Single Estimate for Each Group

calc_model_sum_stat()

Function to Calculate Summary Measures from Multiple Runs of the Sutherland et al.'s Model

fit_model_to_data()

Fit Percentage of First Year Cases

gen_annual_change_scenarios()

Function to Generate Annual Change Scenarios Based on Sutherland Assumptions

gen_scenario_results()

A Function to Generate Scenario Results from the Sutherland Model

inc_rates_uk_e

Incidence Rates per 100,000 in the UK born in England

nots_ew

Tuberculosis Notifications in England and Wales 1913-2016

sample_annual_decrease_inc_rates()

Samples the Percentage Annual Decrease Based On Incidence Rates

sample_annual_decrease_nots()

Samples the Percentage Annual Decrease Based On Notifications

sample_inc_rate()

Function to Sample from the Underlying Distribution of an Incidence Rate

sample_incidence_rates()

Function to sample Sutherland Incidence rates to Include Uncertainty

sample_model_parameters()

Function to Sample Model Parameters

sample_per_decrease()

A Function to Sample the Annual Percentage Decrease with Uncertainty

simulate_sutherland_model()

Function to run multiple simulations of the Sutherland et al. Estimation Model

sutherland_TB_decrease

Sutherland Assumption of Annual TB decrease

sutherland_data

Data used in Sutherland et al

sutherland_gen_time

Assumed Generation time From Sutherland et al.

sutherland_incidence_rates

Incidence rates used in Sutherland et al

sutherland_model()

Sutherland et al. Model to Estimate Impact of Ending the BCG School Scheme

sutherland_results

Results for Total notifications From Sutherland et al.

sutherland_trans_params()

Estimate Transmission chain parameters using Sutherland et al.s Approach
